name: Fate's Call: A New Beginning
description:
Fate’s Call: A New Beginning a new VR Fantasy RPG !
You are Talos, a hero that has been awoken by ancient ghosts to save the world once again.
Evil forces are plotting against peace. You are the only one who can stop them before it's too late. Explore the world of Fate’s Call, defeat monsters & bosses with your sword, bow, or magic spells.

Jump into this magical VR Fantasy story, driven by a unique fighting system, dynamic world and story fully voice-acted !

Compatible Headset & Controllers : Vive, Index, Oculus, Window Mixed Reality
